item.title: Judge asked to force Trump admin to pay full SNAP benefits
item.description: Prior presidential administrations have continued paying SNAP benefits during past shutdowns of the U.S. government.

item.title: Dick Cheney, powerful former U.S. vice president who pushed for Iraq war, dies at 84
item.description: Dick Cheney died Monday night from complications of pneumonia and cardiac and vascular disease, his family said.
